history.text: Hi.
Hello
Have you seen Despicable Me?
I want to watch the movie
It's really good!
Yes I have watched Despicable Me 1 and 2
Awesome :) Me too! I loved them.
Despicable Me is rated pretty highly
81% on Rotten Tomatos and 72/100 Metacritic
Yeah they were very funny and intriguing. I liked gruu's kids mostly
Totally. they're adorable characters
Yeah rotten tomatoes is usually hard to get high ratings
Exactly! Says a lot for this movie
Yeah gru's kids are very cute, you just wanna watch them and enjoy their funny moments
aw yeah! They really liven up the story. It's already a cool story line with Dr. Gru wanting to shrink and steal the  moon, and the kids liven it  up.
Yeah 81% is very high on rotten tomatoes and 72/100 on metacritic is great. It is definitely worth recommending to friends or family,
oh absolutely
The voice actors are great choices too!
Yeah and the Minions!! the minions!!! They always kill it. They deserve a show on their own.
Aw yeah I totally agree! Like the penguins from madagascar got a show. Why not the minions?
Yeah I agree on the voice characters they seem to be well vetted and chosen.
For sure
steve carell is wonderful :D
I love the part at the theme park!
Yeah, why not the crazy and many minions. They always crack me up, and they seem to be superhuman, they never die, no matter what happens to them.
yeah right? they always return to normal haha
Yeah steve carell, he is the voice of Gru if I'm not mistaken. Yeah it's unique, I could not have pegged him to have such a voice.
yes he is Gru! I agree. Unexpected but very good.
Gru is funny, who could come up with a plan of shrinking the moon and stealing it?
Right? And succeeding!
Like, he successfully shrinks and steals the moon
though it does provide an opportunity for the girls to get kidnapped by Dr. nefario haha
Oh, I don't even remember whether he managed to steal it. Thanks for that info.
yeah for sure
The show is just wacky and hilarious with a nice twist of adventure and espionage. I just loved watching it.
totally!  it's so well written
I hope more shows with that kind of uniqueness and wackiness continue to come up.
I feel like going to watch it again.

uid2response.feedback: I loved the way the other user introduced the movie and I would definitely watch the movie again, even though I have watched it in the past.
